children.comment: When I say "simple" I don't mean "easy". Were it so easy, I would have started to learn German by now, since my ancestry traces back there.
... that I actually think in english, I sometimes throw english words in a german sentence and i forgot some german terms for english words.
Actually it got quite hard for me to speak german. I'm german, i lived my entire life in germany and i spent so much time on the internet...
It's not incorrect, it's just that German is a surprisingly simple language with humorous sounding words to English speakers.
